DataElement.preferredName: PI-RADS T2 Transitional Zone Assessed Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Score to represent a structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS) using the time it takes for the net nuclear spin in the plane that is perpendicular to the magnetic field of a spectrometer to decay to zero.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging and diagnosis. Prostate images are obtained using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS). Each lesion receives a score from 1 to 5 for each individual imaging parameter, as well as an overall 1-5 grading score reflecting the likelihood of clinically significant cancer, with 1 being most probably benign and 5 being highly suspicious of malignancy._The time it takes for the net nuclear spin in the plane that is perpendicular to the magnetic field of a spectrometer to decay to zero._The zone of the prostatic parenchyma that surrounds the proximal urethra._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging and diagnosis. Prostate images are obtained using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS). Each lesion receives a score from 1 to 5 for each individual imaging parameter, as well as an overall 1-5 grading score reflecting the likelihood of clinically significant cancer, with 1 being most probably benign and 5 being highly suspicious of malignancy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A structured reporting scheme for multiparametric prostate cancer imaging and diagnosis. Prostate images are obtained using multiple MRI techniques including T2 weighted images, a dynamic contrast-enhanced study (DCE), diffusion weighted imaging (DWI), and possibly spectroscopy (MRS). Each lesion receives a score from 1 to 5 for each individual imaging parameter, as well as an overall 1-5 grading score reflecting the likelihood of clinically significant cancer, with 1 being most probably benign and 5 being highly suspicious of malignancy._The zone of the prostatic parenchyma that surrounds the proximal urethra._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Same as d, but involving the anterior fibromuscular stroma or the anterior horn of the PZ, usually lenticular or water-drop shaped.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Same as d, but involving the anterior fibromuscular stroma or the anterior horn of the PZ, usually lenticular or water-drop shaped.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Same as d, but involving the anterior fibromuscular stroma or the anterior horn of the PZ, usually lenticular or water-drop shaped.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Intermediate appearances not in categories a/b or d/e.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Intermediate appearances not in categories a/b or d/e.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Intermediate appearances not in categories a/b or d/e.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Areas of more homogeneous low SI, however well marginated, originating from the TZ/BPH.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Areas of more homogeneous low SI, however well marginated, originating from the TZ/BPH.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Areas of more homogeneous low SI, however well marginated, originating from the TZ/BPH.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Heterogeneous TZ adenoma with well-defined margins: "organized chaos".

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Heterogeneous TZ adenoma with well-defined margins: "organized chaos".
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Heterogeneous TZ adenoma with well-defined margins: "organised chaos".

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Areas of more homogeneous low SI, ill defined: "erased charcoal sign".

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Areas of more homogeneous low SI, ill defined: "erased charcoal sign".
